articles.title: Animals with a slower rate of genetic mutations have longer lifespans, study reveals - Daily Mail
articles.description: Researchers from the Wellcome Sanger Institute compared the genomes of 16 species and found animals with a slower rate of genetic changes have longer lifespans.
articles.content:
It's a mystery that has baffled scientists for years why do different animals have such different lifespans?
